lead_paragraph: Prices fell in March as rising petroleum costs were offset by declining prices for other goods, a sign of muted inflation.

headline.print_headline: Falling Import Prices May Slow Rise in Interest Rate
headline.main: Falling Import Prices in U.S. May Slow Rise in Interest Rate

snippet: Prices fell in March as rising petroleum costs were offset by declining prices for other goods, a sign of muted inflation.
abstract: Labor Dept reports that import pries fell in March, sign of lower inflation that suggests Federal Reserve will not raise interest rates in June.
